translated: At that time, this buddha realm was illuminated, shining, and radiant in the empty and non-empty buddha realms of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, whether they were pure or impure.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: lhang nge ba bzhin te /🔽de ltar de'i tshe mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang phyogs bcu'i gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dag dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dag na kun nas mchog tu lham me /

translated: shining brightly, and shining radiantly.🔽In the same way, at that time, this Sahā buddha realm was supreme in shining,

original: lhan ne / lhang ngar gyur to //
analyzed: lhan ne / lhang ngar gyur to //

original: de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa dang / gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag dang / gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang /🔽mi 'jigs pa thob pa'i bar de dag sangs rgyas @151a *//

translated: Then, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who were in those buddha realms, those who had emerged after a hundred eons, those who were skilled in the wisdom that is not dependent on others with regard to the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: kyi mthu sa de nas chas te sems kyi skad cig ma gig dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhugs nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin sa steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to //

translated: those who had attained fearlessness—all of them, by the power of the Buddha, departed from those buddha realms and, in a single instant of mind, entered this buddha realm. Having entered, they sat cross-legged on the ground in their respective places.

original: de bzhin du rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la nan tan dag tu byed cing ji ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa de dag dang / mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen dang ldan pa de dag gi lus las de 'dra ba kho na'i 'od byung bar gyur to //

translated: In the same way, those who are diligent in their virtuous practices, who have attained the power of virtue, and who possess the causes and conditions for fearlessness, their bodies emit light.

translated: Then the Blessed One, surrounded by the saṅgha of monks, said to the great hearers:

original: khyed bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la ltos shig /
analyzed: khyed bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la ltos shig /
translated: “Look at the power of the domain of concentration!

original: byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyus bdud thams cad kyi yul dang / klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dir chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dang / gsal bar mdzad pa'i phyir mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad yongs su spyad pa mdzad do //

translated: By the power of his blessing, he has subdued the domain of all demons and the domain of all nāgas, and in order to make this buddha realm of Sahā shine, he has caused all the past thus-gone ones to enjoy themselves here, in order to ensure the continuity of the lineage of the Dharma and the Three Jewels.

original: de bzhin du da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med /
analyzed: de bzhin du da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med /
translated: In the same way, at present, innumerable,

original: dpag tu med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bsam gtan @151b dang / mngon par shes pa'i yul la rnam par rtse ba dang ldan pa dag gis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /

translated: Therefore, I will make this buddha-field endowed with the great earth, endowed with the essence, endowed with the qualities, endowed with mindfulness, endowed with effort, and endowed with giving, just like other buddha-fields.”

original: de lta bas na /🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der zhugs pa de dag der 'khod nas rang rang gi ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsam gtan dag byed de sgom pa de dag las kha cig gis
analyzed: de lta bas na / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der zhugs pa de dag der 'khod nas rang rang gi ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsam gtan dag byed de sgom pa de dag las kha cig gis
translated: Thus,🔽those bodhisattva-mahāsattvas who have entered that buddha-field of Sahā, having settled there, each according to their suitability, practice and cultivate the dhyānas through their virtuous side.

original: lus las ni /
analyzed: lus las ni /
translated: From some of them,

original: 'od 'di lta bu byung ste /
analyzed: 'od 'di lta bu byung ste /
translated: light like this arose,

original: dper na / 'bru mar gyi mar me bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / 'bru mar gyi mar me bzhin no //
translated: like an oil lamp.

original: kha cig gi lus las ni /
analyzed: kha cig gi lus las ni /
translated: From some bodies,🔽light like this arose,

original: 'od 'di lta bu'i bar dag byung ste /
analyzed: 'od 'di lta bu'i bar dag byung ste /
translated: up to

original: dper na / zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'od bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'od bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the light of many hundreds of thousands of millions of moons and suns.

original: der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du 'dus pa da ltar snang ba chen pos sangs rgyas kyi @174a *//🔽zhing mi mjed khyab par gyur to //
analyzed: der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du 'dus pa da ltar snang ba chen pos sangs rgyas kyi @174a *// zhing mi mjed khyab par gyur to //
translated: There, many bodhisattva mahāsattvas gathered. At that time, a great light pervaded the Buddha's realm of Sahā.

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lhags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang sngon der ma phyin pa sha stag de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin las langs nas
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lhags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang sngon der ma phyin pa sha stag de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin las langs nas
translated: All the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who had come from all the buddha realms in the ten directions, all those bodhisattva mahāsattvas who had not previously arrived there, at that time arose from their samādhi

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der chas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der chas te /
translated: and set out for the Buddha's realm of Sahā.

original: der dong nas kyang skyil mo krung gis 'khod cing rang rang gi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed do //
analyzed: der dong nas kyang skyil mo krung gis 'khod cing rang rang gi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed do //
translated: Having gone there, they sat cross-legged and played with various kinds of their own meditative absorptions.

original: der yang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la de dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
analyzed: der yang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la de dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
translated: They will also pay homage to the Tathāgata Śākyamuni.

original: bsnyen bkur byed do //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur byed do //
translated: They will serve him.

original: 'dus pa chen po de la'ang lta bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dus pa chen po de la'ang lta bar byed do //
translated: They will also see that great assembly.

original: der de dag nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa dang / klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang / sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags nyan par yang byed do //
analyzed: der de dag nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa dang / klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang / sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags nyan par yang byed do //
translated: There they will hear the Dharma discourse called The Essence of the Sun, the chapter called The Light Ray That Destroys the Nāgas, and the dhāraṇī mantra that exhausts the karma of sentient beings.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble son,

original: khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs pas rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs pas rigs kyi bu /
translated: you have now arisen from samādhi. Noble son,

original: khyod da mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyod da mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: you should now go to the Sahā world system.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble son,

original: @174b sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na ni /
analyzed: @174b sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na ni /
translated: in that Sahā world system,

original: sems can rnams shin tu sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan zhing srid pa'i ltung la btags pa dag yin te; sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nang na'ang bud med gzugs mi sdug pa dang / tshul du mi shes pa dang / mchog tu gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs pa dang /🔽dri nga ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbrar spyod pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang / ngo gnyis byed pa dang / bden pa ma yin pa'i tshig smra ba dang / tshangs par spyod par nga rgyal byed pa dang / blun pa dang /
analyzed: sems can rnams shin tu sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan zhing srid pa'i ltung la btags pa dag yin te; sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nang na'ang bud med gzugs mi sdug pa dang / tshul du mi shes pa dang / mchog tu gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs pa dang / dri nga ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbrar spyod pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang / ngo gnyis byed pa dang / bden pa ma yin pa'i tshig smra ba dang / tshangs par spyod par nga rgyal byed pa dang / blun pa dang /
translated: The beings there are bound by the fetters of desire and are fallen into existence. In that buddha realm there are no women, no ugly forms, no ignorance, no pride in supreme physical beauty,🔽no foul smells, no impurity, no pride in cleanliness, no duplicity, no speaking untruth, no pride in celibacy, no stupidity,

original: mkhas par nga rgyal can dang / ser sna can dang / gtong bar nga rgyal can dang / ma dad pa dang / dad par nga rgyal can dang / g-yo sgyu can dang / sgyu byed pa dang / drang po'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang /
analyzed: mkhas par nga rgyal can dang / ser sna can dang / gtong bar nga rgyal can dang / ma dad pa dang / dad par nga rgyal can dang / g-yo sgyu can dang / sgyu byed pa dang / drang po'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang /
translated: no pride in being learned, no stinginess, no pride in generosity, no lack of faith, no pride in faith, no deceit, no pretense, and no pride in being honest.

original: phrag dog can dang / phrag dog med pa'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang / gnod sems dang ldan pa'i sems dang / byams par nga rgyal can dang / rnam par dbyen byed pa dang / mthun par nga rgyal can dang / log par lta ba dang /
analyzed: phrag dog can dang / phrag dog med pa'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal can dang / gnod sems dang ldan pa'i sems dang / byams par nga rgyal can dang / rnam par dbyen byed pa dang / mthun par nga rgyal can dang / log par lta ba dang /
translated: those who are jealous and those who are proud of not being jealous,🔽those who have a malicious mind and those who are proud of their love,🔽those who cause division and those who are proud of being harmonious,

original: yang dag par lta ba'i nga rgyal can yin te /
analyzed: yang dag par lta ba'i nga rgyal can yin te /
translated: those who have wrong views and those who are proud of having right views.

original: skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa @175a *//
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa @175a *//
translated: Great wise holy beings

original: chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dag bsam gtan yongs su sbyang ba byas su zin kyang yud tsam gyis bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dag bsam gtan yongs su sbyang ba byas su zin kyang yud tsam gyis bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: who have attained magical powers and play with supernormal knowledge, even if they have perfected concentration, can be brought under the power of women in an instant.

original: bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang / ngan song ba dag dang / sems can dmyal ba pa dag tu 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang / ngan song ba dag dang / sems can dmyal ba pa dag tu 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Because of the faults of women, they will fall away from all roots of virtue, go to the lower realms, and become hell beings.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la nga'i bkas zhu ba'i phyir nga'i bkas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar spro na /
analyzed: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la nga'i bkas zhu ba'i phyir nga'i bkas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar spro na /
translated: If you wish to go to the Sahā world to ask about my welfare to the Tathāgata Śākyamuni,

original: der nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la nga dad pa sbyin par mdzad do //
analyzed: der nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la nga dad pa sbyin par mdzad do //
translated: I will give you the dhāraṇī mantra that destroys the karma of sentient beings, which is called the chapter on the light rays that destroy the nāga realms and abide in the Dharma of the essence of the sun.

original: der bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba /
analyzed: der bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba /
translated: There, the dhāraṇī mantra that accords with the truth is very powerful,

original: phan yon che ba /
analyzed: phan yon che ba /
translated: very beneficial,

original: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /🔽gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa / gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
translated: completely destroys all desire and attachment,🔽completely destroys all attachment to form,

original: gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
translated: completely destroys all attachment to the formless,

original: nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / @175b nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
analyzed: nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / @175b nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
translated: completely destroys all pride, haughtiness, and conceit,

original: tshol ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
analyzed: tshol ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
translated: It causes the complete exhaustion of all forms of seeking.

original: brnab sems thams cad dang / rgod pa thams cad dang / ma rig pa thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
analyzed: brnab sems thams cad dang / rgod pa thams cad dang / ma rig pa thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
translated: It causes the complete exhaustion of all forms of covetousness, all forms of excitement, and all forms of ignorance.

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba thams cad dang / mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba thams cad dang / the tshom thams cad dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba thams cad dang / mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba thams cad dang / the tshom thams cad dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
translated: It causes the complete exhaustion of all forms of the view of the transitory collection, all forms of extreme views, all forms of doubt, and all forms of the view that grasps at rules and ritual as being paramount.

original: rtag par lta ba thams cad dang / chad par lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
analyzed: rtag par lta ba thams cad dang / chad par lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
translated: It causes the complete exhaustion of all forms of the view of permanence and all forms of the view of annihilation.

original: sems can du lta ba thams cad dang / sgrib par lta ba thams cad dang / gso bar lta ba thams cad dang / gang zag tu lta ba thams cad dang / byed pa por lta ba thams cad dang / tshor ba por lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
analyzed: sems can du lta ba thams cad dang / sgrib par lta ba thams cad dang / gso bar lta ba thams cad dang / gang zag tu lta ba thams cad dang / byed pa por lta ba thams cad dang / tshor ba por lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
translated: It causes the complete exhaustion of all forms of the view of a being, all forms of the view of an obstruction, all forms of the view of a living being, all forms of the view of a person, all forms of the view of an agent, and all forms of the view of a feeler.

original: gzugs su lta ba thams cad dang / sgrar lta ba thams cad dang / drir lta ba thams cad dang / ror lta ba thams cad dang / reg byar lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
analyzed: gzugs su lta ba thams cad dang / sgrar lta ba thams cad dang / drir lta ba thams cad dang / ror lta ba thams cad dang / reg byar lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa /
translated: It is the complete exhaustion of all views of form, all views of sound, all views of smell, all views of taste, and all views of touch.

original: rmad du byung ba chen por lta ba thams cad dang / skye bar lta ba thams cad dang / gnas par lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa 'di dang / bden pa dang rjes su mthun @176a *//
analyzed: rmad du byung ba chen por lta ba thams cad dang / skye bar lta ba thams cad dang / gnas par lta ba thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa 'di dang / bden pa dang rjes su mthun @176a *//
translated: It is the complete exhaustion of all views of the great marvel, all views of birth, and all views of abiding.

original: pa'i bzod pa /
analyzed: pa'i bzod pa /
translated: It is the acceptance that accords with the truth.

original: gzugs kyi phung po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa /
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa /
translated: It is the thorough understanding of all the aggregates of form, and so forth, up to the thorough understanding of all the aggregates of consciousness.

original: mig gi dbang po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa nas yid kyi dbang po thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa nas yid kyi dbang po thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa /
translated: They are the perfect knowledge of all the faculties of the eye, and so on up to the perfect knowledge of all the faculties of the mind.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa /🔽spong bar byed pa /
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa / spong bar byed pa /
translated: They are the perfect knowledge of all the aggregates, elements, and sense-spheres.🔽They are the abandonment of all the aggregates, elements, and sense-spheres.

original: chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa /
translated: They are the dispassion towards all phenomena.

original: byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad ston par byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad do //
analyzed: byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad ston par byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad do //
translated: They are the teaching of the bliss of liberation.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de dang de na sems can rnams 'byung po dmus long 'dra ba dag dang / mchog tu glen pa dag dang / 'byung po lug dang 'dra ba dag dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis myos pa dag yod de; bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de dang de na sems can rnams 'byung po dmus long 'dra ba dag dang / mchog tu glen pa dag dang / 'byung po lug dang 'dra ba dag dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis myos pa dag yod de; bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni /
translated: In such and such places there are beings who are like blind men, who are extremely stupid, who are like sheep, who are intoxicated by desire and attachment.

original: sems can de dag gi lta ba thams cad spong ba dang / longs spyod mi zad pa nyid byed @176b pa yin /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi lta ba thams cad spong ba dang / longs spyod mi zad pa nyid byed @176b pa yin /
translated: It eliminates all the views of those beings and makes their enjoyments inexhaustible.

original: bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni /
analyzed: bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni /
translated: This acceptance that accords with the truth

original: chos thams cad kyi gter brtan pa yin /🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi gter brtan pa yin / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa /
translated: is the stable treasure of all phenomena.🔽It conquers all the māras and opponents with regard to inconceivable phenomena.

original: bdud thams cad kyi yul rnam par 'jig par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bdud thams cad kyi yul rnam par 'jig par byed pa yin no //
translated: It destroys the domain of all māras.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

original: gzhan yang bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni /🔽bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni / bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed pa yin /
translated: furthermore, this acceptance that accords with the truth🔽conquers the māras,

original: klu rnams pham par byed pa yin /
analyzed: klu rnams pham par byed pa yin /
translated: defeats the nāgas,

original: lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin /
translated: delights the gods,

original: gnod sbyin rnams snying dga' bar byed pa yin /🔽lha ma yin rnams 'bros par byed pa yin /
analyzed: gnod sbyin rnams snying dga' bar byed pa yin / lha ma yin rnams 'bros par byed pa yin /
translated: pleases the hearts of the yakṣas,🔽terrifies the asuras,

original: nam mkha' lding rnams dngang par byed pa yin /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding rnams dngang par byed pa yin /
translated: frightens the garuḍas,

original: mi'am ci rnams dad par byed pa yin /
analyzed: mi'am ci rnams dad par byed pa yin /
translated: and inspires faith in the kinnaras.

original: lto 'phye chen po rnams skrag par byed pa yin /🔽phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: lto 'phye chen po rnams skrag par byed pa yin / phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa yin /
translated: It terrifies the great nāgas.🔽It subdues opponents.

original: rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dad par byed pa yin /
analyzed: rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dad par byed pa yin /
translated: It inspires the kṣatriyas.

original: bram ze rnams 'jug par byed pa yin /🔽rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: bram ze rnams 'jug par byed pa yin / rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar byed pa yin /
translated: It engages the brahmins.🔽It delights the vaiśyas.

original: dmangs rigs rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: dmangs rigs rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin /
translated: It gladdens the śūdras.

original: bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa yin /🔽yang  du thos pa rnams skyo @177a *//
analyzed: bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa yin / yang  du thos pa rnams skyo @177a *//
translated: It frees women from desire.

original: bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: bar byed pa yin /
translated: It saddens those who are attached to cyclic existence.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar byed pa yin /
translated: It delights the practitioners of yoga.

original: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin; 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / shva dang /
analyzed: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin; 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / shva dang /

analyzed: klu'i yul thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i 'od zer sgrub pa /

analyzed: sems can rnams kyi las thams cad zad par 'gyur ba sgrub pa /

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa sgrub pa /

analyzed: sems can thams cad dad par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gzhog par byed pa sgrub pa /

analyzed: mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa zhes bya ba yin te /

original: ma gtogs so //
analyzed: ma gtogs so //

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: 'phags pa / yongs su ma spyad pa /

analyzed: ma zad pa /

analyzed: ma sbyangs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu kun tu @189b spyod kyang rung /

translated: if he undertakes the perfection of generosity, he will be blessed by all the buddhas.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang / rkyen gyi rgyal ba dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de'i khyim longs spyod zad mi shes par yang 'gyur ro //

analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / yid ser sna'i dri ma dang bral bas snod yin zhing /

translated: then even if he gives away his head, the best of his limbs, no one in the world, including the gods and demons, will be able to create obstacles for him.

original: ma gtogs so //
analyzed: ma gtogs so //

analyzed: gal te yang de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa na de 'di lta bu rtsom par byed do //
translated: Moreover, when he is striving at the perfection of morality, he should undertake it in the following manner.

translated: He is pleasing to the noble ones, he is blessed by the noble ones, he is endowed with pure morality, patience, and gentleness.

original: rigs thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin /
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin /

original: gzhan la mi smod pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan la mi smod pa yin /

analyzed: bdag la mi bstod pa yin zhing rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par chags pa med pas nyin mtshan 'das par byed do //
translated: he does not praise himself, and he spends his days and nights without excessive attachment to gain and honor.

original: bde bar gnyid kyis log pa dang / bde bar sad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde bar gnyid kyis log pa dang / bde bar sad par 'gyur ro //
translated: He falls asleep happily and wakes up happily.

analyzed: gnod pa chung ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba mod cing mang ba dang / snying rje la gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa dang / rtsol ba don yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will have few problems, and will have plenty of food and drink. He will be compassionate, and will wish to benefit all sentient beings. His efforts will not be wasted.

analyzed: phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur zhing de dag kyang de la skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so //
translated: In the future, when he is dying, he will see the Blessed Buddhas of the ten directions, and they will say to him, ‘Good, good, good man!

analyzed: khyod tshul khrims skyon med pa yin gyi; nged kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tshur shog /
translated: You have kept your ethics without fault. Come to our pure buddha-fields!

original: der nged kyis khyod sa bcu la rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: der nged kyis khyod sa bcu la rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: There we will establish you in the ten stages.’

original: zhes lung ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes lung ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: And they will prophesy to him.

original: de sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyus 'phags pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyus 'phags pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And because he has seen the Buddhas, he will experience the joy and faith of the noble ones.

original: de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa stong pa ma yin pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa stong pa ma yin pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And when they die, they will be reborn in a pure buddha realm that is not empty.

original: de der yang myur du sa bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de der yang myur du sa bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: And there they will quickly attain the tenth bhūmi.

original: de sa bcu la gnas nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: de sa bcu la gnas nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: And having attained the tenth bhūmi, they will quickly attain the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.

original: skyes bu @190b de mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di thos pa tsam gyi mod la de gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na /🔽de 'di lta ste /
analyzed: skyes bu @190b de mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di thos pa tsam gyi mod la de gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na / de 'di lta ste /
translated: “If that person, merely by hearing this teaching of the inexhaustible casket, were to practice the perfection of effort,🔽then they would have such effort, strength, enthusiasm, intelligence, and excellent courage

original: sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mthun pas brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / spro ba dang / blo dang / pha rol gnon pa dam pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don byed pa dang / don mthun pas brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / spro ba dang / blo dang / pha rol gnon pa dam pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: as generosity, pleasant speech, meaningful speech, and consistency between words and deeds.

original: lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang / mi'i dbang po thams cad kyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin /🔽mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin /
analyzed: lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang / mi'i dbang po thams cad kyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin / mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin /
translated: He is worthy of the faith of all the lords of the gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, mahoragas, and humans.

original: dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin /
analyzed: dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin /
translated: He is worthy of offerings, worthy of veneration, and worthy of being remembered.🔽He is worthy of being delighted in and worthy of being protected.

original: mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / rab tu bsrung ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / rab tu bsrung ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: He will quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, complete, perfect enlightenment.”

original: skyes bu de mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di thos pa tsam gyi mod la gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na /
analyzed: skyes bu de mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di thos pa tsam gyi mod la gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na /
translated: The moment that person hears this inexhaustible casket dhāraṇī, if they practice the perfection of patience,

original: de sems can thams cad dang bral ba dang / mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i bzod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de sems can thams cad dang bral ba dang / mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i bzod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur te /
translated: they will attain that kind of patience that is free from all sentient beings, endowed with non-apprehension, blessed by the noble ones, and focused on the Dharma.

original: des kyang de'i yan lag dang nying lag dag phyung @191a *//
analyzed: des kyang de'i yan lag dang nying lag dag phyung @191a *//
translated: Even if someone were to cut off and carry away their limbs and minor appendages,

original: zhing bcad na'ang sems kyi skad cig gcig kyang khro ba bskyed par mi 'gyur zhing khro ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur //
analyzed: zhing bcad na'ang sems kyi skad cig gcig kyang khro ba bskyed par mi 'gyur zhing khro ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur //
translated: not even a single moment of anger would arise in them, and they would abandon all anger.

original: lha'i dbang po thams cad nas mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha'i dbang po thams cad nas mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: They would become worthy of being revered by all the lords of the gods up to all the lords of humans, and they would quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: de bzhin du skyes bu de mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di thos pa tsam gyi mod la gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na /
analyzed: de bzhin du skyes bu de mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di thos pa tsam gyi mod la gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na /
translated: In the same way, as soon as that person hears this teaching of the inexhaustible casket, if they practice the perfection of meditation,

original: myur du 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / bzod pa'i sgo de lta bu bye ba phrag brgya stong thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / bzod pa'i sgo de lta bu bye ba phrag brgya stong thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will quickly attain a hundred thousand quintillion such gateways of noble blessings, of the concentrations that focus on phenomena, of the liberations, of the formless absorptions, of the gateways of meditative stability, of the gateways of mnemonic powers, and of the gateways of patient acceptance.

original: dus thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be contemplated by all the buddhas at all times.

original: de lha'i dbang po thams cad nas mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis bsam par 'gyur zhing dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur
analyzed: de lha'i dbang po thams cad nas mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis bsam par 'gyur zhing dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur
translated: They will be worthy of being contemplated and trusted by all the lords of the gods down to all the lords of humans, and they will quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ro // rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: ro // rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of a good family!

original: gang la la mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di @191b lan gcig tsam sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na /
analyzed: gang la la mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di @191b lan gcig tsam sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na /
translated: Anyone who listens just once with a one-pointed mind to this instruction called ‘The Inexhaustible Casket’

original: de la lhag par yang dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / nye bar rtog pa kun tu skyed par byed do //
analyzed: de la lhag par yang dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / nye bar rtog pa kun tu skyed par byed do //
translated: will give rise to a special joy, faith, and understanding.

original: de las kyi sgrib pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bgegs byed pa /🔽'phangs pa / so sor ma brten pa /
analyzed: de las kyi sgrib pa dang / sems kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bgegs byed pa / 'phangs pa / so sor ma brten pa /
translated: They will have karmic obscurations, mental obscurations, obscurations of phenomena, and afflictive obscurations that obstruct all roots of virtue,🔽that are deep-seated,

original: ma zad pa /
analyzed: ma zad pa /
translated: that are not individually discerned,🔽and that are not exhausted.

original: ma sbyangs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang ma lus par zad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma sbyangs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang ma lus par zad par 'gyur te /
translated: and the unpurified [karmas] as numerous as the sands of the Ganges will be completely exhausted.

original: de la 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //🔽mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs par byed pa'i las rnams ni /
analyzed: de la 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro // mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs par byed pa'i las rnams ni /
translated: [But] the result will not be accomplished.

original: ma gtogs so //
analyzed: ma gtogs so //
translated: Except for those who have committed the heinous crimes, who have abandoned the true Dharma, and who have reviled the noble ones.

original: de gang gi tshe 'phags pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na /
analyzed: de gang gi tshe 'phags pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom of the noble ones,

original: de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will be blessed by all the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal pa dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal pa dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be blessed by all the bodhisattvas, pratyekabuddhas, and arhats.

original: dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will delight in solitude.

original: gang dag gis de la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po legs par sbyangs par byas pa dang / shin tu mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dag de'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang dag gis de la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po legs par sbyangs par byas pa dang / shin tu mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dag de'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who have well trained the faculty of noble wisdom in that way, and who have reached the culmination of that, will give rise to such qualities in their minds and mental factors.

original: de chos thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur zhing the tshom med pa dang / the tshom las brgal bar @192a *//
analyzed: de chos thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur zhing the tshom med pa dang / the tshom las brgal bar @192a *//
translated: They will engage with all phenomena without doubt, and will transcend doubt.

original: 'gyur ro // lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not be overcome by the world with its gods and asuras.

original: de lha'i dbang po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / mi'i dbang po thams cad kyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
analyzed: de lha'i dbang po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / mi'i dbang po thams cad kyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /
translated: They will be worthy of the faith of all the lords of the gods, lords of the yakṣas, lords of the asuras, lords of the garuḍas, lords of the kinnaras, and lords of the mahoragas.

original: dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / rab tu bsrung ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: dran par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / rab tu bsrung ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin no //
translated: He is worthy of being remembered, worthy of being delighted in, worthy of being worshipped, worthy of being revered, and worthy of being protected.

original: de phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe phyogs bcu kun tu goms pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe phyogs bcu kun tu goms pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the future, when he is dying, he will see the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, in all the ten directions.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing de la 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par tshur shog /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing de la 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par tshur shog /
translated: Those Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, will extend their hands to him and say to him, ‘Good man, come to our pure Buddha-fields!

original: der gnas par byos shig /
analyzed: der gnas par byos shig /
translated: Live there!

original: der nged kyis rigs pas sa bcu la gzhag par mdzad do //
analyzed: der nged kyis rigs pas sa bcu la gzhag par mdzad do //
translated: There we will establish you in the ten grounds by means of reasoning.’

original: zhes kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will also say this.

original: de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / 'phags pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa stong pa ma yin pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / 'phags pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa stong pa ma yin pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having seen the Buddha, and having the joy and faith of the noble ones, when they die they will be reborn in the pure buddha-fields that are not empty.

original: de der yang sa bcu thob cing ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag @192b par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: de der yang sa bcu thob cing ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag @192b par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: There, having attained the ten grounds, they will quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni /
analyzed: mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni /
translated: this great exposition of the inexhaustible casket

original: de ltar phan yon che ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar phan yon che ba yin no //
translated: has such great benefits.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad nas smad cing bor ba mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba'i sems can gang mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di thos nas byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad nas smad cing bor ba mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba'i sems can gang mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di thos nas byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
translated: In all the completely pure buddha realms, those sentient beings who have been reviled and abandoned, who have committed the actions of immediate retribution, who have abandoned the sublime Dharma, who have insulted noble beings, and who have committed the root downfalls, will, upon hearing this great explanation of the inexhaustible core, come to possess a loving mind.

original: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phra ma mi byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / tshig kyal ba mi smra ba'i sems dang ldan pas lo bdun du gnas par byed cing rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par byed la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phra ma mi byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / tshig kyal ba mi smra ba'i sems dang ldan pas lo bdun du gnas par byed cing rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par byed la /
translated: They will come to possess a mind of compassion for all sentient beings, an impartial mind, a mind that does not engage in slander, and a mind that does not speak frivolous words. They will abide in this way for seven years, constantly cultivating the recollection of the Buddha.

original: nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyi ga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di dran par byed na /
analyzed: nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyi ga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di dran par byed na /
translated: Three times during the day and three times during the night, he should drape his Dharma robe over one shoulder, kneel on both knees, place his palms together, and bring to mind the buddhas.

original: lo bdun 'das nas de'i las drag po sthams cad ma lus par zad par 'gyur zhing sbyangs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lo bdun 'das nas de'i las drag po sthams cad ma lus par zad par 'gyur zhing sbyangs par 'gyur te /
translated: If he does this, then after seven years all his intense karma will be exhausted and purified.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni /
analyzed: mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni /
translated: this great inexhaustible casket dhāraṇī

original: de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no //
translated: is thus a great marvel.

original: 'dir dbang phyug la mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang @193a *//
analyzed: 'dir dbang phyug la mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang @193a *//
translated: Here, any woman who desires to have a son

original: zhig mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di thos nas zla ba bdun du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan
analyzed: zhig mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di thos nas zla ba bdun du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan
translated: Having heard this inexhaustible core prophecy, for seven months, three times a day and three times a night, she placed her two knees on the ground, joined her palms, and in front of her visualized the Buddha.

original: pa 'di dran par byed na bud med de ris mthun par dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa 'di dran par byed na bud med de ris mthun par dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: If she recalls this inexhaustible core prophecy, that woman will attain the state of Maheśvara in her present life.🔽Later, until unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, she will not attain the state of a woman in saṃsāra, except in accordance with her own aspirations.

original: phyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par 'khor bar bud med kyi dngos po thob par mi 'gyur ro; ;khyo mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba nas rigs mngon par 'dod
analyzed: phyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par 'khor bar bud med kyi dngos po thob par mi 'gyur ro; ;khyo mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba nas rigs mngon par 'dod
translated: “A woman who desires a husband” and so on.

original: pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang / nor mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang / mngal na bu yod pa'i khur gyis skyo ba'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang / bu mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar de khrus byas nas byi 'chor ba srung bar byed cing nyin lan gsum dben par /
analyzed: pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang / nor mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang / mngal na bu yod pa'i khur gyis skyo ba'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang / bu mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar de khrus byas nas byi 'chor ba srung bar byed cing nyin lan gsum dben par /
translated: If that woman, after bathing, protects the child in her womb, and three times a day in private,

original: mtshan lan gsum dben par pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di dran par byed na /
analyzed: mtshan lan gsum dben par pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di dran par byed na /
translated: and three times a night in private, kneels on the ground with both knees, bows with palms joined, and in front of the Buddha, with her mind focused on the Buddha, recalls this great instruction of the prophecy of the inexhaustible casket,

original: bud med de bu ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu 'byung bar @193b 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bud med de bu ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu 'byung bar @193b 'gyur ro //
translated: then the woman will give birth to a son just as she desires.

original: bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'ang rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par de'i bud med thob pa'i tha ma yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'ang rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par de'i bud med thob pa'i tha ma yin no //
translated: and until the unsurpassed parinirvāṇa, except for his own aspirations, that will be the last time he obtains a female body.
